name: 龍祈澔
objective:
本課程重點將讓學生認識投影與布幕的相互關係，從不同的光源與反射體的應用創造出視訊投影的藝術作品。利用介紹案例的方式，讓學生認識不同形式的投影藝術，其中包含 2D 牆面投影藝術、3D 建築投影藝術、球型投影、浮空投影等。
This course aims at providing students the knowledge of projector and screen. Case studies allow students to understand varying types of projection art, including 2D projection on wall, 3D projection on building, spherical projection and holographic projection.
